data.title: Meeting with Federal President Joachim Gauck
data.text:
Berlin, Germany

19 September 2014

Federal President Joachim Gauck of Germany received President Benino S. Aquino III at the Schloss Bellevue, the official residence and presidential palace.

After President Aquino signed the guest book, he met with the Federal President who was a former Lutheran pastor and became known as an anti-communist civil rights activist in East Germany.

Germany is the biggest economy in the European Union (EU) and the fourth largest in the world. It is one of the important donors of the Official Development Assistance (ODA) for the Philippines. It has donated about P10 billion or â‚¬176 million for relief and rehabilitation efforts of typhoon Yolanda-affected areas.
